title.english: Hybrid x Heart Magias Academy Ataraxia

description:
Hida Kizuna possesses the HHG (Heart Hybrid Gear) ability, but it is not strong enough to make him particularly important. His older sister calls him to transfer to a strategic defense school, where many of the students (many of which are large-breasted girls) use their HHG abilities to fight invaders from another world while wearing extremely skimpy pilot outfits. Kizuna's fighting ability doesn't measure up, but his sister has another plan; getting the girls to have erotic experiences with Kizuna, so that it will allow them to replenish their energy or power-up. It looks like his new school life is going to be full of embarrassment!

(Source: MangaHelpers)

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Achronological Order
tags.description: Chapters or episodes do not occur in chronological order.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Estranged Family
tags.description: At least one family member of the MC intentionally distances themselves or a family distances themselves from a person related to the MC.

tags.name: Large Breasts
tags.description: Features a character with larger-than-average breasts.

node.description:
Masamune is a Japanese novelist. His work "Soul Synchro Machine" won the 18th Sneakerbunko Grand Price and was later renamed to "Masou Gakuen HxH" and published in February 2014. The same work has received an Anime adaptation in 2016. In September 2016 Masamune starting writing his second series "Ecstas Online". After partially writing the script for the Anime adaptation of his work, he started to write scripts for other Anime as well, namely "Hajimete no Gal" and "Ore ga Suki nano wa Imouto Dakedo Imouto janai". He has been writing a few other series since then, and mainly writes for the Kadokawa label Sneakerbunko.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kuji_masamune)

__Doujin Circle:__ Neko wa Manma ga Utsukushii

[Website](http://nekoman9.x.fc2.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nekomanHisasi) | [Piapro](http://piapro.jp/hisasi) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/users/119045)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/94072097)

Close friends with [Kai Shibata](https://anilist.co/staff/132094/).

Married to fellow Animator [Reiko Nagasawa](https://anilist.co/staff/140343).
